### Part 1: DNA strings

```{r}
gliadin_data <- read_lines(here("data", "beta_gliadin.txt"), skip = 1)
gliadin_data
```

# Imports the beta gliadin dataset and removes the first line. 

```{r}
gliadin_wrangled <- str_replace_all(gliadin_data, c("\\d" = "", "\\s" = "")) 
gliadin_wrangled
```

# Removes all digits (numbers), and then all of the spaces within the above dataset. 

```{r}
str_c(gliadin_wrangled, collapse = "")
```

# Collapses the strings into a single string.
